ComTalk_024: <sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry, I can't enhance that clothing item.
ComTalk_025:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry, but that particular clothing item
is out of my hands.
ComTalk_026:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I can't do anything with that clothing
item right now. I would need the help of
my sisters' powers...
ComTalk_027:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Please don't ask the impossible of me.
If I could borrow my sisters' powers,
things might be different, but...
ComTalk_010:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you want me to enhance any of your
other clothes?
ComTalk_028:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>That item... Right now I can't do anything
with it. It might be different if I could
borrow my sisters' powers...
ComTalk_011:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Please, let me explain why I cannot
enhance your clothes.
ComTalk_029:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry, but...<sp:5:1:0>to enhance that clothing
item, I'd need the aid of my sisters'
powers...
ComTalk_052:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Look! <sp:5:1:0>With this level of quality, it's
hardly recognizable.
ComTalk_012:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'd love to enhance your clothing, <sp:5:0:0>but
you don't seem to be carrying any.
Or wearing any for that matter...
If you get your hands on some clothes
that look like they could be enhanced,<sp:5:0:0>
come back and visit me again.
ComTalk_053: <sp:3:0:2:0800>It's just a little thing, but I hope it helps.
ComTalk_013:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Notice>Hmm? What's this... <sp:5:1:0>You don't have any
clothing that I can enhance?<sp:5:0:0> Really?

Let's take a look, just to be sure.
Talk_1004: <sp:3:0:2:0001><clr:0000>Kaysa<clr:ffff> is near a stable in Hyrule Field.
Talk_1005: <sp:3:0:2:0001><clr:0000>Cotera <clr:ffff>is near the stable in west Necluda.
ComTalk_015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0>
I can enhance your clothing
<clr:0000>a fair amount<clr:ffff>.
ComTalk_016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0>
I can <clr:0000>greatly<clr:ffff> enhance your clothing.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Anyone calling upon me<sp:5:0:0> from out there
in all that ugliness...<sp:5:0:0> You must be a
monster of some kind.
As if I'd ever give my <clr:0000>blessing of clothing
enhancement<clr:ffff> to one of you.
ComTalk_017:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>With the power available to me...<sp:5:0:0>I can
enhance your clothing <clr:0000>to the maximum<clr:ffff>!
ComTalk_040:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_00>Oh, what a feeling! That first breath of
fresh air! It's just so...intoxicating!
Talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I moved near the stable here so I could
give my <clr:0000>blessings<clr:ffff> to travelers.

I suppose that if I heard something truly
rousing, like the <clr:0000>sound of a drum<clr:ffff>...

I might feel <clr:0000>inspired to come outside<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
But only maybe.
ComTalk_041:
The beat of the drum has lit a fire deep in
my heart.

<snd:Think_00>And what about you? Can you feel the
heat? Are you ready for more?

Allow me to <clr:0000>enhance<clr:ffff> your clothing.<sp:5:0:0>
It's the least I can do, but I will need
the necessary <clr:0000>materials<clr:ffff>...
Talk_1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>There's no amount of begging that will
get me to leave my flower bud.

And I won't give my <clr:0000>blessing of clothing
enhancement<clr:ffff> to anyone I don't trust.

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_00>I suppose if I heard something truly
rousing, like the <clr:0000>sound of a drum<clr:ffff>...

I might feel <clr:0000>inspired to come outside<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0>
But only maybe.
ComTalk_001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, welcome back, boy. Do you want me
to enhance your clothing?
ComTalk_042:
<snd:TalkPositive>I hear that my big sister Kaysa is at a
stable near the Gerudo region to the west.
ComTalk_043:
<snd:TalkPositive>I hear that my big sister Mija is near a
stable in the Hebra region northwest
of here.
ComTalk_101:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hmm? <sp:5:0:0>You don't have enough rupees.<sp:5:0:0>
You can't get my blessing with my good
will alone!
ComTalk_045:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have <clr:0000>two<clr:ffff> more sisters who have also
lost hope for this world and withdrawn
into their buds.
If you reinvigorate them as well, <sp:5:0:0>I will
have the power to enhance your clothes
even more.
ComTalk_004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You...<sp:5:1:0> You've reinvigorated my forlorn
family, haven't you?

Come back anytime you're looking to
enhance your clothing to the maximum!
ComTalk_102:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>You don't have enough rupees.
My blessing isn't free, you know.
ComTalk_005:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I thought I would improve some other
clothes for you, <sp:5:0:0>but it looks like that's
not possible right now.
ComTalk_103:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>What a shameâ€”you don't have the
rupees required! Why don't you try
something else?
ComTalk_046:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><sp:5:0:0>Enhancing clothes like this can sometimes
draw out their <clr:0000>true power<clr:ffff>.

But only if you wear the whole set! Well,
and not all sets have the potential...
ComTalk_006:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Please return when you have clothes
or materials...or when one of my sisters
comes out of her flower bud.
ComTalk_104:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh dear! You don't have enough rupees.
No rupees, no enhancement.
ComTalk_007:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Please come back if you get some strong
new clothes or materials.
ComTalk_030:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Hm? It seems like you don't have
enough materials...
ComTalk_008: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think_00>All right, let me do my thing!
ComTalk_031:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>If you don't have the materials,
I can't enhance it.
ComTalk_009:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Which clothing item would you like me
to enhance?
ComTalk_032:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>It's unfortunate, but you don't have
enough materials. How about trying
something else?
ComTalk_033:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Huh... You don't have enough materials!
Why not try another clothing item?
ComTalk_034:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>What now? <sp:5:0:0>Are you being modest?
We can try a different clothing item
if you'd like.
ComTalk_036:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You made a mistake? I guess it happens
from time to time...
ComTalk_038:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have <clr:0000>one<clr:ffff> more sister who has also
lost hope for this world and withdrawn
into her bud.
If you reinvigorate her as well, <sp:5:0:0>I will
have the power to enhance your clothes
even more.
ComTalk_039:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>All finished!<sp:5:0:0> What do you think? Are you
marveling at its strength? <sp:5:1:0>

Speaking of strength, enhancing clothing
sometimes draws out its <clr:0000>true power<clr:ffff>.

But only if you wear the whole set! Well,
and not all sets have the potential...
ComTalk_022:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>There are some clothing items that can't
be enhanced,<sp:5:0:0> even with my powers.
ComTalk_023:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I can't do anything with that clothing
item... How about a different one?
